special_text:
At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, you draw a card and Waldemar deals 1 damage to you.
[+1]: Target player discards a card. If they can’t, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent.
[-3]: Target player exiles a nonland permanent they control. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
